headline: Dillard's Q3 Earnings Beat on Expense Control, Stock Jumps 11%
summary: DDS showcases better-than-expected Q3 performance driven by stringent expense management leading to strong retail gross margins and lower operating expenses.

headline: Sally Beauty Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates, Comparable Sales Rise Y/Y

headline: Tapestry Confirms End of Merger Deal With Capri Holdings
summary: TPR pulls out of the merger with Capri, redirecting efforts toward expanding its business and enhancing shareholder value.
